changes: Improved the layout of the home page.
Improved some text.
Style upgrades.
Ui improvements.
New add power production lines.
Posible to overclock or underclock the power production lines.
New power production UI.
Fixed some issues whit requesting users to join the production line.
Fixed issue whit calculating the power consumption when overclocking.
Improved the add user and delete user functionality on production lines.
The other user now has to accept the invitation to join the production line.
Improved security
Made it required to verify email before being able to log in.
Fixed changing email and username in the account settings.
Removed outputs from disabled production lines.
Improved some styling.
Applied new color scheme to the website.
Added light and dark mode.
Added button to toggle between light and dark mode. on the account page.
Fixed showing table of outputs when there are no outputs.
Fixed not able to delete production lines.
Fixed not able to delete user
Added Boosted Alien Power Augmenter to the power production.
Updated the power production to the newest be able to handle the new update.
Updated the database to be the latest version. For the satisfactory update 1.0!!!.
Full save game wipe was sadly necessary to make this update work. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Improved the performance of the calculations.
Fixed adding a miner or other machines removed the other machines.
Added options to stop auto calculations and start them again.
Added auto save every 5 minutes. (Off by default)
Added a start for settings for production lines. NOTE: This is not yet implemented.
Added on shift click not returning to game save when saving the production line.
Changed some styling to make it more user-friendly.
Added hover to all the buttons to explain what they do.
Fixed not accurate calculations due to the rounding off of the numbers.
Improved the power table by rounding off the numbers to 3 decimal places.
Fixed styling of the changelog button.
Big fix for the automated calculations.
Added changelog button
Made calculations more accurate and efficient.
Added import and export functionality for the data.
Fixed small bug for loading data from the database.
Fixed small bug for the calculation of the total amount of the imported products.
Made it run faster and more efficient.
Made all the calculations faster and automated.
Initial release.
